::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}

- One exam, Multiple universities
- Conducted by NTA
- 250+ Universities accept it
- Replaced individual exams

## CUET Exam Pattern {background-color="#ffffff"}

### Three Main Sections

| Section | Details | Options |
|---------|---------|---------|
| **I** | Languages | 13 languages - Choose 1 |
| **II** | Domain Subjects | 23 subjects - Choose up to 3 |
| **III** | General Test | 01 General Aptitude Test |

<br>

::: {.fragment}
**Key Point:** Choose subjects based on your desired course!
:::

## How to Choose Languages {background-color="#ecfdf5"}

### Section I: 13 Languages

**Rules:**

- Minimum 1 language required
- Maximum 2 languages allowed
- Choose languages you're comfortable with

<br>

::: {.fragment}
**Strategy:** Choose your strongest language + Check university requirements
:::

---

## Domain Subjects - The Key Decision! {background-color="#fef3c7"}

### 23 Domain Subjects Available

::: {.callout-important}
## Critical Rules
- Choose subjects relevant to your desired course
- Maximum 3 subjects
- Must have studied them in Class 12
- **Syllabus as per NCERT**
:::

<br>

::: {.fragment}
**Don't choose randomly - Each subject matters!**
:::

---

## 3-Step Subject Selection Strategy

::: {.incremental}
1. **Know Your Goal**
   - Which course do you want?
   - Which universities offer it?

2. **Check University Requirements**
   - Each university lists mandatory subjects
   - Visit official websites

3. **Choose Smartly**
   - Subjects you're strong in
   - Required by target universities
   - Keep multiple options open
:::
